plot: A mild-mannered farmer's daughter falls in love with fireman from the neighbouring town, causing uproar among the villagers.
title: Virumbugirean
plot_es: A mild-mannered farmer's daughter falls in love with fireman from the neighbouring town, causing uproar among the villagers.
plot_en: A mild-mannered farmer's daughter falls in love with fireman from the neighbouring town, causing uproar among the villagers.
